code: export var loadState=function loadState(){try{var serializedState=localStorage.getItem('state');if(serializedState===null)return undefined;return JSON.parse(serializedState);}catch(error){console.log(error);return undefined;}};export var saveState=function saveState(state){try{var serializedState=JSON.stringify(state);localStorage.setItem('state',serializedState);}catch(err){console.log(err);}};
